City1.name: Hyderabad
City1.about:
Points to Note:

 1.Don't overload your plate, you are expected to finish everything.
2.Remove your shoes when entering someone's home, even if they tell you it is all right to wear your shoes.
 3.It is almost never all right.Smoking is prohibited in public buses, elevators, theaters, cinemas, air-conditioned restaurants, shopping centers and government offices.
4.Don't take photograph without permission.

City2.name: Dubai
City2.about:
Points to Note:

1.It is also not appropriate for men to go around without a top on away from the beach.
2.Do not take any photographs of any local residents without permission.
3.If you have broken the law, then you will be arrested and taken to police station, questioned and instructed to make a statement.
4.If you are caught driving with any level of alcohol in your blood expect a jail sentence.
City2.helpline:

Fire Department: 997
Ambulance: 999
Tourist Security Department of Dubai Police: 800-4438
